CmdLine: apt-get update  && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y ca-certificates cmake gcc g++ git libopus-dev libsodium-dev libvpx-dev pkg-config python-dev  && apt-get clean  && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: git clone https://github.com/TokTok/c-toxcore /build/c-toxcore  && cmake -B/build/c-toxcore/_build -H/build/c-toxcore -DBOOTSTRAP_DAEMON=OFF  && make -C/build/c-toxcore/_build install -j"$(nproc)"  && python setup.py install  && rm -r /build/*
Commands.Name: run
